fields.name: Passives:
fields.value:
- Plunder: When the Merchant event arrives, gain 3 cards of your choice instead of 1.  
- Loot: Whenever you Kill someone, take all of the cards they did not use.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Pillage: Give a Chaos member a non-special card of your choice. [2 uses, 2 CD]
- Threaten: When in a trade, take all cards from the opposing player immediately. [1 use, Unique]
- Intimidate: Prevent half of the Order members from drawing this phase. [1 use, Unique]
